title: NFS - Hot Pursuit
description:
Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit

Feel the rush of the escape and the thrill of the takedown!

Outrun the law as a Racer in supercars like the Pagani Zonda Cinque Ã¢â‚¬â€œ or stop racers cold as a Cop in high-speed police interceptors like the Lamborghini Reventon. CHASE ACHIEVEMENTS
Drive up to 20 precision-performance cars in adrenaline-fueled showdowns across 24 day-and-night tracks. Take it to the limit in 48 total Cop and Racer Career Events, collect bounty, and rise to the top of the ranks.

DUEL IT OUT ON THE ROAD
As a Cop, lay down the law with roadblocks and spike strips Ã¢â‚¬â€œ or fry the RacerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s electrical system with an EMP lock. As a Racer, make the getaway with overdrive, jamming, and oil slicks. Duel it out on the road!
